EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - What's New with 8.3.0? - Customers - External(Installed Base) - 2014.1
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our What’s New in 8.3.0 Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: What’s New in 8.3.0
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry you missed our webinar where we presented all our new testing solutions in the 8.3.0 release. Tricentis’ own VP of Product Management, Gerd Weishaar and our Worldwide Director for Pre-Sales and Consulting, Roman Zednik, gave a walk-through and demo of all the new features that the 8.3.0 release has to offer. Questions from the audience helped to keep the webinar lively and informative.
If you would like to see what you missed, a recording of our webinar is available here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-od-whats-new-with-8.3.0-thank-you.html>. Additional videos of our new features and solutions are also available here <http://www.tricentis.com/products/what-is-new>.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>. Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Gerd Weishaar VP Product Management Tricentis
Roman Zednik Worldwide Director for Pre-Sales Consulting Tricentis
